name: AnimeSaturn
description: AnimeSaturn Ã¨ un provider di streaming online per anime sottotitolati e doppiati in italiano
author: RubRix22
payload: class Provider { api = 'https://animesaturn.to'; getSettings() { return { episodeServers: ['Server 1', 'Server 2'], supportsDub: true }; } async search(query) { let normalizedQuery = this.normalizeQuery(query['query']); console.log('Normalized Query: ' + normalizedQuery); const url = `${this.api}/browser?keyword=${encodeURIComponent(normalizedQuery)}`; try { const data = await this._makeRequest(url); const $ = LoadDoc(data); const animes = []; $('div.aitem-wrapper>div.aitem').each((_, elem) => { const id = elem.find('a.poster').attr('href')?.slice(1) ?? ''; const title = elem.find('a.title').attr('title') ?? ''; const subOrDub = this.isSubOrDubOrBoth(elem); const url = `${this.api}/${id.slice(1)}`; const anime = { id: `${id}?dub=${query['dub']}`, url: url, title: title, subOrDub: subOrDub }; animes.push(anime); }); return animes; } catch (ex) { throw new Error(ex); } } }
